The Ordinance Committee will conduct a public hearing on the Harvard Square Zoning Petition.
1.

A Zoning Petition Has been received from Suzanne P. Blier regarding Harvard Square Zoning
Petition.

2.

A communication was received from Iram Farooq, Assistant City Manager / Community
Development City of Cambridge, regarding the Harvard Square Zoning Petition

3.

A communication was received from Thomas J. Lucey, Director of Government & Community
Relations for Harvard University, regarding Harvard Square zoning petition
